sourcesContent:
Order summary

Your oder charge and arrival time depends on your location

  • Total Price Before Shipping £{{basketTotals.subTotal}}
  • Shipping Price £{{basketTotals.shippingPrice}}
  • Total Price with Shipping £{{basketTotals.total}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { BasketService } from 'app/basket/basket.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-order-total', templateUrl: './order-total.component.html', styleUrls: ['./order-toatal.component.scss'] }) export class OrderTotalComponent { constructor(public basketService:BasketService){ } }
